entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: Quidditch is described as a serious business. It is also mentioned that the conditions look ideal for playing Quidditch.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as looking around at Ron and then staring at Ginny when he hears about Malfoy being ill.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is described as smacking his lips and looking pale and sick.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny Weasley is mentioned as already wearing her Quidditch robes and waiting in the changing room. She also shares information about Slytherin Chaser Vaisey being too sore to play.

entities.name: vaisey
entities.description: Vaisey is mentioned as a Slytherin Chaser who took a Bludger in the head yesterday during their practice and is now too sore to play.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as having gone off sick. Ginny says it's great for them because he's being replaced by Harper.

entities.name: harper
entities.description: Harper is mentioned as an idiot and is replacing Malfoy in the game.

entities.name: demelza
entities.description: Demelza is mentioned as already wearing her Quidditch robes and waiting in the changing room with Ginny.
